headline: Trump Has Alienated Some Mormons, and They Could Help Lift Biden in Arizona
text: TUCSON — For the better part of a century, members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints have made their political home under the Republican Party’s tent, motivated by conservative beliefs rooted in the family values, personal liberty and economic frugality of their faith.
snippet: Members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints tend to vote Republican. But in Arizona, some find the president’s behavior at odds with their values and are shifting to Joe Biden.
